title: Introduction to C Programming
details: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to the fundamentals of C Programming. You will learn the basics of C syntax, data types, control structures, and more. Suitable for beginners.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
details: Master the world of algorithms with our introductory course. Explore various algorithmic techniques and problem-solving strategies. Prior programming experience is recommended.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: Combine C++ programming with Data Structures and Algorithms to build a strong foundation in problem-solving. This course is suitable for those with prior programming knowledge.

title: Basic Data Structures
details: Explore essential data structures such as arrays, linked lists, and trees, and their real-world applications. Prior programming experience is recommended.

title: Introduction to CQP Python
details: An introduction to Python programming for Computational and Quantum Programming. Dive into Python's applications in quantum computing and simulations.

title: Software Engineering
details: Learn the principles and practices of software engineering, including software development methodologies, project management, and quality assurance.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
details: Master Amazon Web Services (AWS) and the world of Cloud Computing. Explore cloud infrastructure, services, and deployment strategies.

title: Database (MySQL)
details: Gain hands-on experience in MySQL Database Management. Learn database design, SQL queries, and data manipulation.

title: Problem-Solving Part
details: Develop your problem-solving skills interactively. Solve coding challenges and logical puzzles to enhance your analytical thinking.
